module.name: Ceres GLayer Library
module.description: The Ceres GLayer Library provides a framework for rendering of multiple graphical layers to some graphics context.
module.changelog:
changes in 0.13.3
- method added to AbstractMultiLevelSource to compute scaled image rectangles - system properties added to customise rendering performance ceres.renderer.cache.capacity ceres.renderer.cache.retentionPeriod - WakefulComponent can now be set disabled
